question:
Given a portion of a valid Java EE web application’s directory structure:
MyApp
| |– File1.html | |– Directory1 | |– File2.html | |– META-INF |– File3.html

options.A: You want to know whether File1.html, File2.html, and/or File3.html will be directly accessible byyour web client’s browsers.Which statement is true?
options.B: All three files are directly accessible.
options.F: Only File1.html and File2.html are directly accessible.
options.G: Only File1.html and File3.html are directly accessible.
options.H: Only File2.html and File3.html are directly accessible.
